name: Blast Off - LDJam42
description:
BLAST OFF

The planet is shrinking and you've got to get off, fast. Collect the pieces of your ship and escape before it's too late!

If you enjoy please rate it here, it is greatly appreciated:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/blast-off/

Ludum Dare Jam 42 submission

Theme - "Running Out of Space"

Controls

  • wasd - move
  • mouse - aim
  • left click - shoot
  • e - build

Updates will come in the form of a separate project as this is my LDJam42 submission. INCLUDING A SHOP

Music by Eric Matyas

www.soundimage.org
